record.id: field.name="avail.to.order" and file.name="ocmprofile" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: avail.to.order
record.file.name: ocmprofile

brief.brief: If selected (set to true), enables members of this profile to determine whether an item is available for processing.
When this option is true, Service Manager this option displays two functions that toggle between each other based on the status of the avail.to.order field.

detail.detail: Mark Avail: Enables the operator to mark the first level of associated Line Items as being available for Ordering. This starts the Order generation process for a Quote's Line Items.
Drop Avail: Sets the avail.to.order flag to false. In other words, the Quote Line Item is no longer available for Order processing.
